original_text: At that time, more and more people became disciples of Jesus. Among the believers, some were Jews who spoke the Greek language. Others were Jews who spoke the Aramaic language. The Jews who spoke Greek had a problem with the other Jews. They said, ‘The widows in our group do not receive the right help. Each day, when you give out the food and money, our widows receive less than they should get.’
korean_text: 그 때에 제자가 더 많아졌는데 헬라파 유대인들이 자기의 과부들이 매일의 구제에 빠지므로 히브리파 사람을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: more and more people became disciples of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 점점 더 많은 사람들이 예수의 제자가 되었다

sentences.original_text: some were Jews who spoke the Greek language
Others were Jews who spoke the Aramaic language
The Jews who spoke Greek had a problem with the other Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스어를 하는 유대인들이 다른 유대인들에게 문제가 있었다

sentences.original_text: The widows in our group do not receive the right help
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 그룹의 과부들은 올바른 도움을 받지 못하고 있다

sentences.original_text: Each day, when you give out the food and money
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 너희가 음식과 돈을 나누어 줄 때

sentences.original_text: our widows receive less than they should get
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 과부들은 받아야 할 것보다 덜 받는다
